name: Unlikely Culprit
description:
The people of San Ixtunal are disappearing. With no other choices the agency sent their top agent to take care of it. You must stop the disappearances no matter what.

Arrows - move X - interact / shoot / pick item Z - Open Bag

M - Mute

Update 10 - 19 - 2018  -Changed the opacity of environment  -screwed up save system -Added, Chef now gives a subtle hint when given a meal
